title: On Twitter, Elon Musk Details His Plans for Twitter’s Business
description: Mr. Musk, the social media service’s new owner, has been looking for ways to generate more revenue at the company.
dc:creator: Tiffany Hsu and Kate Conger
media:description: Twitter’s headquarters in San Francisco. Elon Musk, the company’s new owner, has moved rapidly to overhaul the social media service.
